data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 454,800 people living in Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Hamirpur.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 454,800 people living in Hamirpur through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jat Dhillon (Muslim traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,003 believers in Hamirpur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 449,797 lost friends and neighbors.
